data.name: Flying Umbrella
data.detailed_description:
"Flying Umbrella" - 2d platformer game about a girl who moves in different directions with every gust of wind. Learn to control your body. The bus won't wait long. Collect berries, only carefully flying around traps and wild animals. Everything will work out!

First rain, then hurricane. How to be a little girl who hurries to the school bus. Help her fly to the bus and collect all the berries she has lost. Only accurately it is not known what flies in the air.

Game Features:
  • Beautiful Weather Effects
  • Pixel Art
  • Physical World
  • Over 30 levels!

data.short_description: "Flying Umbrella" - 2d platformer game about a girl who moves in different directions with every gust of wind. Learn to control your body. The bus won't wait long. Collect berries, only carefully flying around traps and wild animals. Everything will work out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
